Rectal itch ... u should realize that the ORIGINAL final fantasy for NES was to be the creators 'final' attempt at a game, after so many failed attempts ... he created about half a dozen games that were just terrible - then he created final fantasy which became a huge hit ... and it took off from there. why change the name of a series that works through a name that works well? it is each of the worlds final fantasies, no two games are ever in the same world (with the exception of the new upcoming xiii games)
